description: You may think that installing a car stereo is as simple as connecting a few power cables, but that simply isn't the case. Installing your own car stereo is an intricate process and can affect the entire workings of your vehicle if done improperly. Another unfortunate fact about installing a car stereo is that the installation can cost more than the equipment! Whether you are putting new tweeters in your truck or a sub, amp, and mid range speakers in your tuner car, you are definitely going to need some help with which wire to connect to your deck and which one is the ground wire. If you want to learn how to install your own stereo safely and without paying an arm and a leg, you need the Automobile Sound System Basics ebook. Get your guide today!
